description: Ready in 20 minutes, these juicy Greek-style beef wraps make a perfect midweek family meal.
name: Quick Greekstyle Beef Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, cut into wedges, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add mince and cook, stirring to break up lumps, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Add half of the mixed herbs and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until fragrant and cooked. Remove from heat. Season with pepper. Transfer to a bowl.
Wipe pan clean. Heat wraps for 30 seconds each side or until golden brown. Place wraps on serving plates. Prepare salad kit according to packet instructions.
Top wraps with salad and follow with mince mixture. Sprinkle with remaining dried herbs. Serve with lemon wedges.
